queries.query:
select system_id, Contact_Address_Type.caption, city || ', ' || US_State_Type.caption from Person_Address, US_State_Type, Contact_Address_Type, Record_Status where Person_Address.parent_id = ? and Person_Address.address_type_id = Contact_Address_Type.id and Person_Address.state_id = US_State_Type.id and Person_Address.rec_stat_id = Record_Status.id and Record_Status.caption = 'Active'
Addnav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-add,personAttribute.address,personAttribute.personAddressTableDialog?parent_id=${request:person_id}nav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-update,personAttribute.address,personAttribute.personAddressTableDialog?system_id=${0}nav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-delete,personAttribute.address,personAttribute.personAddressTableDialog?system_id=${0}

select system_id, Org.org_code, Person_Type.caption from Person_Classification, Org, Person_Type where Person_Classification.person_id = ? and (Person_Classification.org_id = Org.org_id or Person_Classification.org_id = NULL) and Person_Classification.person_type_id = Person_Type.id
Addnav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-add,personAttribute.classification,personAttribute.personClassificationTableDialog?parent_id=${request:person_id}nav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-update,personAttribute.classification,personAttribute.personClassificationTableDialog?parent_id=${request:person_id}&system_id=${0}nav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-delete,personAttribute.classification,personAttribute.personClassificationTableDialog?parent_id=${request:person_id}&system_id=${0}

select system_id, Contact_Method_Type.caption, method_value from Person_Contact, Contact_Method_Type where Person_Contact.parent_id = ? and Person_Contact.method_type = Contact_Method_Type.id
Addnav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-add,personAttribute.contact,personAttribute.personContactTableDialog?parent_id=${request:person_id}nav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-add,personAttribute.contact,personAttribute.personContactTableDialog?parent_id=${request:person_id}&system_id=${0}nav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-delete,personAttribute.contact,personAttribute.personContactTableDialog?parent_id=${request:person_id}&system_id=${0}

select system_id, Ethnicity_Type.caption from Person_Ethnicity, Ethnicity_Type where Person_Ethnicity.person_id = ? and Person_Ethnicity.ethnicity_id = Ethnicity_Type.id
Addnav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-add,personAttribute.ethnicity,personAttribute.personEthnicityTableDialognav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-update,personAttribute.ethnicity,personAttribute.personEthnicityTableDialog?system_id=${0}nav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-delete,personAttribute.ethnicity,personAttribute.personEthnicityTableDialog?system_id=${0}

select perIns.system_id, insPol.person_id, insPer.name_first || ' ' || insPer.name_last, insPerRelTy.caption, perIns.guar_person_id, guarPer.name_first || ' ' || guarPer.name_last, guarPerRelTy.caption from Person_Insurance perIns, Person insPer, Person guarPer, Person_Relationship insPerRel, Person_Relationship guarPerRel, Person_Relationship_Type insPerRelTy, Person_Relationship_Type guarPerRelTy, Ins_Policy insPol where perIns.person_id = ?
and
perIns.policy_id != null and perIns.policy_id = insPol.policy_id and insPol.person_id = insPer.person_id
and
perIns.guar_person_id = guarPer.person_id
and
perIns.ins_rel_id = insPerRel.system_id and insPerRel.rel_type = insPerRelTy.id
and
perIns.guar_rel_id = guarPerRel.system_id and guarPerRel.rel_type = guarPerRelTy.id

select system_id, Language_Type.caption from Person_Language, Language_Type where Person_Language.person_id = ? and Person_Language.language_id = Language_Type.id
Addnav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-add,personAttribute.language,personAttribute.personLanguageTableDialognav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-update,personAttribute.language,personAttribute.personLanguageTableDialog?system_id=${0}nav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-delete,personAttribute.language,personAttribute.personLanguageTableDialog?system_id=${0}

select system_id, (Person.name_first || ' ' || Person.name_last), Person_Relationship_Type.caption from Person, Person_Relationship, Person_Relationship_Type where Person_Relationship.parent_id = ? and Person_Relationship.rel_entity_id = Person.person_id and Person_Relationship.rel_type_id = Person_Relationship_Type.id
Addnav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-add,personAttribute.relationship,personAttribute.personRelationshipTableDialog?parent_id=${request:person_id}nav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-update,personAttribute.relationship,personAttribute.personRelationshipTableDialog?system_id=${0}&parent_id=${request:person_id}nav-url-cmd:/person/summary,record-edit-delete,personAttribute.relationship,personAttribute.personRelationshipTableDialog?system_id=${0}&parent_id=${request:person_id}

select person_id, complete_name, birth_date, ssn, Blood_Type.caption, Gender_Type.caption, ethnicity_id, language_id, Marital_Status_Type.caption from Person, Blood_Type, Gender_Type, Marital_status_Type where Person.person_id = ? and Person.blood_type_id = Blood_Type.id and Person.gender_id = Gender_Type.id and Person.marital_status_id = Marital_Status_Type.id
select Ethnicity_Type.caption, system_id from Person_Ethnicity, Ethnicity_Type where Person_Ethnicity.person_id = ? and Person_Ethnicity.ethnicity_id = Ethnicity_Type.id
select Language_Type.caption, system_id from Person_Language, Language_Type where Person_Language.person_id = ? and Person_Language.language_id = Language_Type.id
